name: 2 minutes to the Moon
description:
Game made for the DogeCoin Game jam. To spread love and enthousiasm. Such fun very game. Collect as much doge as you can within 2 minutes. Remember 1 doge = 1 doge.

Up or X : jump

Space or C : attack

Left and right arrow : move

The music used is  https://play.dogmazic.net/song.php?action=show_song&song_id=39758

Tips much very appreciated

DNBZ8RzurL3Ffg2aF8mAxDHQCi9K7TvbHy
